main event: On January 11, 1967, two white lights were observed hovering in the sky over Hollywood, California.
interesting points: The lights were about the size of a quarter and very bright,One object took off at a terrific speed and disappeared within seconds,The other object continued to hover for 2-3 minutes before also disappearing,The witness called their girlfriend to observe the lights,The report was inadequately detailed for scientific evaluation by Project Blue Book.
sighted object: two white lights in the sky
witness description: the main witness and their girlfriend
